channel.title: Skills on Joan Marc Carbó Arnau CV
channel.description: Recent content in Skills on Joan Marc Carbó Arnau CV

item.title: Frontend development
item.description: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Vue, templating and static site generation with Hugo

item.title: Programming languages and backend development
item.description: Golang, Python, Ruby, Java, C. Extensive use of SQL (Postgres, MySQL) and NoSQL (json based) databases. Experience designing microservices and distributed computing architectures.

item.title: DevOps
item.description: Linux (x86_64, Arm64), Docker, Kubernetes, Helm and Helmfile, Terraform. Experience deploying email and storage infrastructures. Cloud environments: GCP, AWS, Linode, Wasabi (S3), Cloudflare.

item.title: Networking
item.description: Experience designing physical corporate networks, SDN and wifi infrastructures.

item.title: Scientific Computing
item.description: R language and scientific clusters running SLURM

item.title: Languages
item.description: Catalan (Native or Bilingual), Spanish (Native or Bilingual), English (Professional Working), French (Limited Working)
